textMateRules.name: Keyword
textMateRules.scope: keyword, keyword.operator.expression, storage.type.function, storage.type.class, storage.type.enum, storage.type.interface, storage.type.property, keyword.operator.new, keyword.operator.new, keyword.operator.delete, storage.type.extends

textMateRules.name: Storage
textMateRules.scope: storage, modifier, keyword.var, entity.name.tag, keyword.control.case, keyword.control.switch

textMateRules.name: String Escape
textMateRules.scope: constant.character.escape, punctuation.quasi.element, punctuation.definition.template-expression, punctuation.section.embedded, storage.type.format, constant.other.placeholder, constant.other.placeholder, variable.interpolation

textMateRules.name: Preproc

textMateRules.name: Property
